overview: Tulan girls Xilan and Orange fell in love with a man named Hou Xihui, so they later arrived in this big city known as the Three Gorges. In this city, Hou Xihui disappeared like a wind. However, the two girls did not want to give up, they decided to stay in the city, in order to wait for the man, but also for the persistent love.
title: Her Name is Xilan
